top_comment.text:
Barrichello: palermão, eterno segundo colocado, cabeça de bagre, mas o cara 
é uma figura não é atoa que ele é; e sempre foi um dos caras mais amados da 
formula 1 principalmente lá fora.﻿
top_comment.author: Éder Casare

comments.text: +Éder Casare Sabe de nada.. O cara é monstro!!!

equipes da F1 quanto pelo público brasileiro. O cara pilota demais!

top_comment.text:
Porra velho, que lindo ver um Dart tão zero na pista!
Se não for pedir muito, vocês poderiam bolar uma forma de colocar um 
velocímetro na nossa tela, pra gente sentir mais em quais velocidades o 
carro está. (Principalmente no vídeo onboard).

Vídeo foda, parabéns!!﻿

captions.text: Look, fellows
Don't know if you guys are seeing
But the security belt...
Here
Are you seeing? Look
It's a security belt from planes
Just to you guys don't think that we are crazy entering in a track without securuty belt
Today "Fast Lap" travels to the past
More precisely to 1970
When the brazilian roads earned a new owner
The Dodge Dart with V8 engine
Through decades the Dodge Darts and Chagers with the big V8 of 5.2L
Were the fastest cars of Brazil
We have 300 hp here
Carburation is quadrajet
Here is punta-taco in the veins
We don't have eletronics
Did found where you switch off the KERS, traction control?
I would say that he will be in this little track around 15 or 20 seconds slower
Do you think in this much?
Yeah, the car brakes well
We are in a Mr. who have 44 years old
This is the first one that I will brake with my right foot
Because if I brake with the left foot, who will do the punta-taco?
I would say that this car is very well made
When you see that an old car is well made?
When you loose the steering wheel and the car goes straight
That's why Fernando wants 120.000 reais to sell
What year this car?
I was born two years later
Did Rubão met Mrs. Idely in one of these?
Did he had one?
My father if he had a car was a Chevette GP 1976
So, the thing was lightweight
Lightweight and little money
A good thing is, if you are here with your girlfriend
You goes and goes, because we don't have support on the side
And in this one we have separated, there are cars where we have just one bank in the front
We have something in the trunk here
Must be the wheel wrench
This noise looks like the noise of your Stock Car V8 or no?
Yeah, we have a little bit of Stock Car here
I'm slipping here
The car is very big, is difficult to turn in the corners
The difficult is to hold the car
Let me ask you something
When you are in this type of car, your respect for guys like Ingo Hoffmann, Paulo Gomes
That accelerated Opalas, Mavericks here in Brazil
My feeling is that increases
Drive this car in the speed that they did in the old Interlagos
With the lap around 4 minutes, was a situation of extreme risk
But when we complain about brakes today, you can imagine what they complain in that time
So, now turn off the chip of 2014 and turn on the chip of 1970 to flat out
I will take out my plane security belt and let's go
"Fast Lap with Rubens Barrichello"
Wow, he turns in very well, man
The gear is not entering
I fell off the bank and the second gear didn't entered
Fast Lap - Second attempt
Let's hold in the bank
He turns well
Just put here some Recaro banks
Now entered
And the prevision of Rubinho was exact
The Dodge was 15s slower than the leader of our ranking
A 1970 car, older than me
But look, the car is very stable
Goes straight
Very interesting situation for me
I'm feeling proud of driving a car where famous names already been and raced
Very cool

title: DODGE DART - VOLTA RÁPIDA #4 COM RUBENS BARRICHELLO | ACELERADOS
